statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-13 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 4 , 3 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x , -17 \, x^{3} - 8 \, x^{2} + 21 \, x + 8 , 4 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 4 , 5 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 4 \, x - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
